sentence.Network_en: The old man still walks erectly.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位老人仍然能挺直腰板走路.

sentence.Network_en: Dilcey was tall and bore herself erectly.
sentence.Network_cn: 身材高大迪尔茜的腰背挺直.
